getsprite(3, btnUp);
spritesetvalue(3, S_WIDTH, 22);
spritesetvalue(3, S_HEIGHT, 18);

getsprite(4, btnDown);
spritesetvalue(4, S_WIDTH, 22);
spritesetvalue(4, S_HEIGHT, 18);

getsprite(5, btnLeft);
spritesetvalue(5, S_WIDTH, 18);
spritesetvalue(5, S_HEIGHT, 22);

getsprite(6, btnRight);
spritesetvalue(6, S_WIDTH, 18);
spritesetvalue(6, S_HEIGHT, 22);

getsprite(1, btnA);
spritesetvalue(1, S_WIDTH, 32);
spritesetvalue(1, S_HEIGHT, 32);

getsprite(2, btnB);
spritesetvalue(2, S_WIDTH, 32);
spritesetvalue(2, S_HEIGHT, 32);

void main(){
	i = 0;
	while(1) {
		putimagerle(background, 0, 0, 128, 128);

		spritesetvalue(1, S_LIVES, 0);
		spritesetvalue(2, S_LIVES, 0);
		spritesetvalue(3, S_LIVES, 0);
		spritesetvalue(4, S_LIVES, 0);
		spritesetvalue(5, S_LIVES, 0);
		spritesetvalue(6, S_LIVES, 0);

		key = getkey();

		if (key & KEY_UP) {
			putsprite(3, 19, 3);
			if(key != last_key) i++;
		}
		if (key & KEY_DOWN) {
			putsprite(4, 19, 39);
			if(key != last_key) i++;
		}
		if (key & KEY_LEFT) {
			putsprite(5, 3, 19);
			if(key != last_key) i++;
		}
		if (key & KEY_RIGHT) {
			putsprite(6, 39, 19);
			if(key != last_key) i++;
		}

		if (key & KEY_A) {
			putsprite(1, 59, 13);
			if(key != last_key) i++;
		}
		if (key & KEY_B){
			putsprite(2, 93, 13);
			if(key != last_key) i++;
		}

		setcolor(12);
		gotoxy(9, 14);
		putn(i);

		delayredraw();
		last_key = key;
	}
}
